document_data.name: Greez
document_data.mainbody:
'''Greez''' was a [[warlock]] who devoted himself to [[the Absolute]], and lived within the [[Shattered Sanctum]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|Ain't just a mark on the flesh: it's magic. Only them what follows the Absolute can see it. Let's us know you're on our side. That way, nobody'll mess with ya.|Greez.}}
document_data.Description: Greez had grey-brown skin and decorated himself in red body paint. He wore a [[leather]] tunic decorated with bones and feathers. His leather good was surrounded the the fractured skull of some terrifying creature.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Greez and other goblins celebrated the [[cult of the Absolute]]'s terrible, yet successful, raid on the [[Waukeen's Rest]] inn. Following their victory, Priestess [[Gut]] offered many of their ranks the ''[[mark of the Absolute]]''.
